docs: i have been on alot of tours and this was the best by far ! !it was awesome ! !if thier is any items you forgot to take with youyou can pick them up at the megalomar , its just like a walmart .it is just south of the market square across from the cruise ship pier . </DOC> our room was beautiful .our view was spectacular and we were only on the 4th floor !we had the king bed , which we felt was very comfortable and great pillows .deck chairs with little table .large walk - in shower and a sink and sitting area that was separate to get ready at . </DOC> the pier keeps the water calm and turquiose , simply beautiful .the piano player was delightful !second time 's a charm at el coz .weather was perfect , room was spacious and clean andwe found out everything just by asking others and exploring the area . </DOC> on the bright side , the location is great - snorkeling , swimming , mini - golf , and two large pools .each day we saw the troops continuously clean every nook and cranny .the walk - in shower was a pleasant bonus ...we had a great view of the ocean and each morning and night witnessed the cruise ships coming and going .there is an ice machine on the first floor , right beside the elevator . </DOC> to start with the beach and water are amazing ! !the beach area was huge with many levels to find a spot to hang out on for the day and the ocean area was also large with plenty of area to snorkel or float around in .we had a room on the bottom floor which was nice to be able to hop out and be at the pool in seconds .too many people trying to access so could not get past a basic email check .mexican show was fun and the live band was really good ! </DOC> this hotel is in a great location to get anywhere .i have stayed here twice and both times was beyond my expectations .not a great swimming beach but who cares ...i am on vacation and they have an awesome pool .for the price we paid , this hotel was about the best in the north end end of cozumel . </DOC> so instead we rented a car in town from isis .check the cozumel forum for information on them .really wish we would have bought a cooler on our first trip to town and stocked it with drinks for the room .breakfast and lunch buffets were good , not great .the food at the dinner restaurant was decent . </DOC> , he was amazing ! with all these people and all the different things that they had booked ....he was on top of each and everyone one of their tours and knew when where each and everyone was going !nothing over the top and fantastic , but definately edible !we had taken the fury catamaran which picked us up right at the pier in front of our hotel .the fury was a great great time !
